description: Command to get the confluent cluster details in a environment.

commands.name: az confluent organization environment cluster create-api-key
commands.summary: Creates API key for a schema registry Cluster ID or Kafka Cluster ID under a environment.
commands.syntax:
az confluent organization environment cluster create-api-key [--cluster-id]
                                                             [--description]
                                                             [--environment-id]
                                                             [--ids]
                                                             [--name]
                                                             [--organization-name]
                                                             [--resource-group]
                                                             [--subscription]

commands.name: az confluent organization environment cluster list
commands.summary: List of all the clusters in a environment.
commands.syntax:
az confluent organization environment cluster list --environment-id
                                                   --organization-name
                                                   --resource-group
                                                   [--max-items]
                                                   [--next-token]
                                                   [--page-size]
                                                   [--page-token]

commands.name: az confluent organization environment cluster show
commands.syntax:
az confluent organization environment cluster show [--cluster-id]
                                                   [--environment-id]
                                                   [--ids]
                                                   [--organization-name]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--subscription]
